posts.postText: So I knifed my traitor friend yesterday,by accident, cause he moved in front of me, and I left cause I had to go. Well then I get back on today to find out that I've been banned for it reason "You kill a friend and then leave, your cool." lol? This made me laugh and made me think thats a bit ridiculous. I even said that it was an accident and he walked in front of me and I still get banned?
Depends on if your idea of "having to go" is anything along the lines of "not wanting to get caught".
Never heard you say it was an accident sorry, but I just wanted a reason and I got one so I'll pm the admin. Thanks.
This seems more as an unban request than anything else. And according to destar, more of a misunderstanding.
